content: Optimizes raycast functions against all part types. The performance improvements range from 25-50% depending on the part type.
Dramatically improves the memory usage of `Class.AudioAnalyzer`.
In Luau's New Type Solver, fixes a crash that would sometimes occur when calling a function with an incomplete type.
Fixes issue where forcefield outlines don't appear on LightingStyle::Soft in Desktop.
Explorer: Pressing the down arrow key from the search bar now selects the first item. Pressing the up arrow key will refocus the search bar.
Significant optimizations for the animation step.
On Windows, Studio no longer generates sporadic `InputState.Begin` event for a key when releasing Shift/Ctrl/Alt modifiers.
Fixes bug with Occlusion Culling where SpecialMesh and BlockMesh with offsets would cause invalid occlusion.
Fixes an issue with the Acoustic Simulation beta feature causing lag spikes when `Class.AudioEmitter|AudioEmitters` or `Class.AudioListener|AudioListeners` are deleted.
Fixes a timing bug with `Class.AudioPlayer` and `Class.AudioTextToSpeech` that can cause their assets to play at full-volume, ignoring connected wires.
Updates debug panels in Studio and Client to correctly show all the relevant information. Previously some values were not populated.
A proper error message now displays when the fallback engine font isn't loaded correctly.
Weld instances no longer duplicate in the Avatar Settings preview when swapping between the Single Collider setting "Use Parts / Colliders".
Removes the auto-open behavior of the Controller Emulator widget. This widget will now stay closed when closed and be independent from the Devices.
Camera speed properly clamps in Visualization Modes panel.
